turkish_example_sentence: Sen bu tehlikeli oyuna başlamayacaktın, söz vermiştin.
english_example_sentence: You were not going to begin this dangerous game, you had promised.
russian_example_sentence: Ты не собирался начинать эту опасную игру, ты обещал.
